title: @RiotKateyKhaos: Project skin line is awesome ESPECIALLY ZED.
body:
If you saw just the Zed model please check the update again XD.

I don't normally post in the forums just lurk around for entertainment, but a certain someones 2 very loud rude post have convinced me to actually post something.

This Zed skin is awesome, and honestly it looks a lot cooler and more menacing  then the other skins in the line BECAUSE it lacks the eye visor. The blank mask devoid of anything resembling a face in my opinion fits perfectly with a ninja, and a camera makes perfect sense.

Honestly the only thing for me is the scarf color because the purple isn't found anywhere else in the model, but its faded enough that it doesnt break the deal.

I just wanna say excellent work on these skins and please, please keep zeds mask so i can really be behind this skin XD.
